Posts.Content: Hello, My sister was diagnosed with breast cancer.  She was given 2 rounds of taxol.  Her last treatment was in june.  she is still having bad pains in her feet and legs.  My question is that the doctors are giving her methadone and morphine, ativan, etc... She had to kick the meth... cold turkey.  What other alternatives does she have to deal with this besides addictive narcotics? Please Help Keesh
